answers.answer: Low sodium diet will help keep swelling and blood pressure down

question: Are there any techniques I can do/use to make sure I have no swelling? before pregnancy I would here that my feet look swollen even when not they are just fat. I'm not even heavy set just was born this way!!! I've had preeclampsia twice in pregnancies so would like to keep an eye out for that symptom.
title: I have naturally fat feet
